name: Rat King (The Mountain)
description:
"As the Cheese Moon rises, something squirms in the gutters and ditches of the world. Can you appease the Rat King before it's too late?"

A grab and go puzzle platformer featuring a very special hamburger grinder.

CONTROLS

- WASD: Move

- Hold left mouse: Aim

- Release left mouse: Throw sack

- R: Retry level

- W: Enter doors

- F4: Toggle fullscreen
